EmailTemplate.name: 201907_BK_Global_CNI5000_MC.201907_BK_Global_Email_CNI5000_MC
EmailTemplate.subject: The CNI 5000 slide-in ADS-B replacement for your CitationJet is ready to install
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[http://www.bendixking.com/]]>
Attention All CitationJet 525 and 525A OwnersÂ | July 10, 2019 <[[http://www.bendixKing.com]]> Are you still in need of your ADS-B upgrade?
Our CNI 5000 <[[https://www.bendixking.com/en/products/cni-5000]]> is the solution for your Cessna CitationJet. We aim to get you back up in the air with minimal down time and provide you support along the way, and at the least cost possible.
- Slide-in replacement for your existing transponders - Maintain all existing wiring and mounts - Can be installed in as little as 4 hours
Contact your area sales manager <[[https://www.bendixking.com/en/sales-team]]> to learn more.
If you are having any difficulties scheduling your aircraft for installation before the mandate? Reach out to us at sales@bendixKing.com <[[mailto:sales@bendixKing.com]]> and ask for our assistance as we are glad to help.
LEARN MORE <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/CNI_5000.html]]>
